title: KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky
descriptions:
Meet the KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer – KHM512 in Aqua Sky: the compact, lightweight kitchen essential that delivers big performance with effortless style.

Why you’ll love it:
- Five speeds, endless possibilities: From gently folding in nuts and chocolate chips at speed one to whipping cloud-light meringues, egg whites, or heavy cream at speed five, you get precision control for every recipe.
- Smooth, mess-free handling: The lockable swivel cord keeps out of your way whether you’re left- or right-handed, so you can mix comfortably from any angle.
- Quick clean, quick swap: Stainless Steel Turbo Beaters power through cookie dough and mashed potatoes, then pop right into the dishwasher. When you’re done, a single button releases accessories with one hand.
- Designed for real kitchens: Compact and lightweight means it stores easily and won’t tire your arm during longer mixes. The cheerful Aqua Sky finish adds a fresh pop of color to your countertop.
- Trusted performance: From the #1 mixer brand in the world based on retail sales revenue across all retail channels (source: Euromonitor International Ltd.; more info at mixerclaim.kitchenaid.com).

From weeknight mashed potatoes to weekend baking marathons, the KitchenAid KHM512 Hand Mixer brings power, control, and convenience to every bowl—beautifully finished in Aqua Sky. Take the guesswork out of mixing and whip up something wonderful today.
